messages.msgSnippet: Hi is it fact or rumor that Nobunaga one day looked at a spanish soldier sword after it was used to cut through armor and said something to the affect
messages.messageBody:
Hi is it fact or rumor that Nobunaga one day looked at a spanish soldier sword after it was used to cut through armor and said something to the affect that----- while it may not be as artful as a japanese sword it was just as good as any in japan.... thanks


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
